name: elasticsearch
description: API around the ElasticSearch RESTful API -- mostly convenience.
author: Nick Campbell (http://github.com/ncb000gt)

scripts.pretest: jshint *.js lib/*.js test/*.js ; jscoverage lib lib-cov
